root.message: The DATA_COMP field for indicator 10-6-1, translated into en
root.data: # Methodology ## Computation method The computation uses each institutionsâ€™ own published membership and voting rights data from their respective annual reports. The proportion of voting rights is computed as the number of voting rights allocated to developing countries, divided by the total number of voting rights. The proportion of membership is calculated by taking the number of developing country members, divided by the total number of members.
